storyInfo: After leaving the inn, Miss Du is scolded by the innkeeper for acting out without permission. With the boatman accompanying, Lee leaves for the Liang estate to pay his client Mr. Liang a visit.

attributes.content: ...Cheh.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Hm? What's this pause for?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Don't tell me I was a little too heavy-handed, and hurt you in my carelessness, young lady?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Hmph. So you know some flowery kung fu. Happy?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Your buccaneer's already fled on us, so there's no sense tangling with you any longer, you—
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: —What's your name?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Nothing. The latter man of Tzu-hsu and Wu-yu.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Keh. What kind of conman gives his real name? That must be some stupid kung fu stage name.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Ah, how keen-witted you are.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: So you're not going to let me past to chase them, right?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Hence why I compliment your keen wit.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Shut it with your flapping!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: What are you waiting for?! Let's take him!
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Miss! We'll help you out!
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: —Hold it!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Eep...
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Ahem.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: This is still an inn. I can't have you two making a mess of the restaurant and fools of us all. What will the passersby think?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: ...Cheh.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: However, you two fought marvelously. In honor of your eye-opening display, I... won't ask you to cover the costs.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: But for now, please rein it in. Call it a day. For my sake.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Do pardon us, good proprietor. We'll resolve this misunderstanding forthwith, then make amends at your door.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: I'll let you go... this time. For the innkeep.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I don't know how you're involved with that guy, but I'd hand him over if I were you.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Cover for him and you're an accomplice. You're free to go for now, but Shangshu doesn't tolerate outlaws.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: If this were simply a matter of outlawry, you could have called the police. What has you resorting to force, Miss Du?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Nothing is right. No matter the reason, a mere disagreement shouldn't bring you to fisticuffs.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Why you...!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Now, now, Miss.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Let's have your people leave.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: M-Miss, do we just let him go...? We could grab him, then wait for the Lungmenite to take the bait—
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Quiet.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: We've already let the Lungmenite escape. Keeping this guy with us all night wouldn't be much use.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Besides, could you even restrain him? And you, you're still holding back some moves, aren't you?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Hardly. Friendship is wealth, now, friendship is wealth. If the young lady here is willing to take a step back, then I couldn't ask for anything more...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: I won't forget this, Nothing.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Please, don't waste your memories on me. The esteemed have so much to forget.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: (Carefully, carefully... Good, I'll get a decent head start from here.)
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: I'm only listening to Mr. Zheng—if you want to see how things play out outside, be my guest. I suggest you sit tight and listen to—
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: —Hey! Where'd he go?!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: H-How did this happen?! What are you all DOING?!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Er... you weren't exactly clear on whether we were letting him go, Miss...
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Don't just stand there! After him!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Y-Yes, Miss!
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Hey, Miss Du, don't you think you're making too big of a mess?
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Out of my way!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Ai, ai, don't—whatever, this isn't my problem anymore...
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: And Dad! Why were acting like this doesn't concern you? You even stopped me!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You were making trouble.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Trouble, my ass! You knew they'd go through Yingfeng Road, right? Isn't that why you were here waiting for them?!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: We've got eyes in dozens of inns and eateries in this city! Catching some blind idiot of a thief's not hard—
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Who's the blind idiot here?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You don't know what that wine cup is, let alone what that Lungmenite might have up his sleeve.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Not to mention how capable those people were. If they were willing to cause a commotion, they'd have won, and come out looking reasonable too.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: But––
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: But what? Do you know just how significant their mission is? Or who the anonymous client is?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You think you're all it takes to put hired escorts to shame?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Looks like no one's following.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Sorry everyone. I should've been leading the way, but here we are in this plight.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I never imagined something like this would await us in Shangshu City though...
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Was it really alright to leave that young man alone? Have we abandoned him?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: The innkeeper and the pushy woman seemed to know each other. I'm worried our rearguard hero might not slip away so easily.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Huh... how do you figure, Mr. Lee?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: She was clearly mindful of him while making her move. That'd never fool me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Get fooled in my line of work, and you're out business.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Then we can only hope he's a fast runner. And honestly, I'd vouch for that.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Will he really be okay?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: He'll be right as rain. The girl wouldn't dare to make a scene in broad daylight, right? It's a quiet street, but SOMEONE's gonna notice.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Phew... That's a relief. But fancy meeting you Rhodes Islanders here.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: And what brings you to Shangshu, Mr. Lee? Commission at your office?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I suppose. Just a private matter entrusted to me by an old friend though.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Is it that box?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: That it is.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But this truly is bizarre. Why would anyone in Shangshu dare to steal Mr. Liang's property?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: It's not bizarre at all. If we could slip into Shangshu without a fuss, why would our Mr. Liang have bothered to seek me out?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Mr. Liang?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: An old schoolmate... You can think of him as the Wei Yenwu of Shangshu.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Wow then... Mr. Wei, huh...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: By the sound of it, you all know Lord Wei of Lungmen quite well?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Maybe the average man on the street wouldn't, but those of us sifting through Lungmen's scraps? Sure, we all do.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Recognizing Lord Wei and being recognized by him are very different things.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: You're not wrong, but let's leave me and Wei Yenwu's somewhat rocky relationship out of this.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Ah. A shame I'll never meet anyone of Lord Wei's caliber.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Sure, he's extraordinary, but not THAT extraordinary.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You're kinda making it sound like Mr. Liang's no big deal by comparison.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Does he count as a big deal?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: He does. Why wouldn't he?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Wait, do you mean Lord Wei of Lungmen doesn't, or Mr. Liang doesn't?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Then I suppose everyone's a big deal these days, tut-tut-tut. Back then, he was just a hothead who didn't even know the meaning of the word 'adapt'.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You're the same as ever, huh Mr. Lee?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hah. What's it matter now, with me eking out my days in Lungmen while he officiates all of Shangshu? We haven't met in forever.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Look, there. It's that young man.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Nothing! Alright, mate?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Ow, ow, ow, ow! Hands off, I'm aching all over...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: You may not realize this, but that young girl just now went utterly berserk! Merely warding her off tested every bone in me, and it was only by the proprietor's timely intervention that I had a gap through which to scurry—
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: With the way you came running over, you're obviously completely fine.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Fan tucked in hand and everything. So care to repeat that? Tested every bone?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Erk... There's no fooling you, benefactor... I will say, though, it's been far too long since I last used so many moves. The muscle ache alone is...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: And this young man is?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Operator Mr. Nothing.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I may not have formally taken the post, but my devoted heart and tireless efforts have long since beaten to Rhodes Island's tune.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: So you're a new operator friend. Good to meet you.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Well met, well met. I hear from my benefactor that you're also an ally to Rhodes Island? Ah, as expected of Rhodes Island, friend to all and beloved by the masses, that they'd strike an accord with a fine soul like yourself, er...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Just call me old Lee.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: How kind of you, Brother Lee.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Well then, brother. You say you only got out once the innkeeper intervened?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Precisely so. What of it?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Hmm... seems things aren't as simple as I thought.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: This isn't the place to stand and chat, too many ears. I'd never forgive myself for another setback.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Then we'll head straight for the Liang estate.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: As for our friends...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I was only told to meet with you. Bringing any more could be a little...
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Ah, never mind.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I doubt Mr. Liang's so small-minded. And you did both help us out, so we'll go together.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: The Liang estate, huh... I'd really rather not bother anyone else...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: It's fine, you're with me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Decisive words, Brother Lee.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Good... if that's settled, then let's be quick. Come, this way.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Brother Lee?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Hmm? Ah... I'll be right there.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Ao?
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: What's this...? Are these strange pets the new trend in Shangshu?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Ao!
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: Brother Lee! Don't fall behind!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: ...I'm coming, I'm coming.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Ao...
attributes.name: Strange Object
